info.title: DataLakeStoreAccountManagementClient
info.description: Creates an Azure Data Lake Store account management client.

get.description: Lists all of the available Data Lake Store REST API operations.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully listed the available operations for Data Lake Store.

get.description: Lists the Data Lake Store accounts within the subscription. The response includes a link to the next page of results, if any.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: The Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of accounts.

get.description: Gets subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Store specified by resource location.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The resource location without whitespace.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Store specified by resource location.

post.description: Checks whether the specified account name is available or taken.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The resource location without whitespace.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to check the Data Lake Store account name availability.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the Data Lake Store account name availability information.

get.description: Gets the current usage count and the limit for the resources of the location under the subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The resource location without whitespace.

200.description: OK -- current usage count and limit retrieved and returned successfully.

get.description: Lists the Data Lake Store accounts within a specific resource group. The response includes a link to the next page of results, if any.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter. Optional.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The number of items to return. Optional.

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: The number of items to skip over before returning elements. Optional.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: OData Select statement. Limits the properties on each entry to just those requested, e.g. Categories?$select=CategoryName,Description. Optional.

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: OrderBy clause. One or more comma-separated expressions with an optional "asc" (the default) or "desc" depending on the order you'd like the values sorted, e.g. Categories?$orderby=CategoryName desc. Optional.

parameters.name: $count
parameters.description: A Boolean value of true or false to request a count of the matching resources included with the resources in the response, e.g. Categories?$count=true. Optional.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of accounts in the specified resource group.

get.description: Gets the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved details of the specified account.

put.description: Creates the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to create the Data Lake Store account.

200.description: Successfully created the account.

201.description: Successfully initiated creation of the account.

delete.description: Deletes the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully deleted the specified account.

202.description: Successfully initiated the deletion of the specified account.

204.description: The specified account was not found.

patch.description: Updates the specified Data Lake Store account information.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to update the Data Lake Store account.

200.description: Successfully updated the account details.

201.description: Successfully initiated the update of the account details.

202.description: Successfully initiated the update of the account details.

post.description: Attempts to enable a user managed Key Vault for encryption of the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully enabled the user-managed Key Vault settings used for encrypting this Data Lake Store account.

get.description: Lists the Data Lake Store firewall rules within the specified Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the list of firewall rules.

get.description: Gets the specified Data Lake Store firewall rule.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName
parameters.description: The name of the Azure resource group.

parameters.name: accountName
parameters.description: The name of the Data Lake Store account.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to retrieve.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: Client Api Version.

200.description: Successfully retrieved the firewall rule.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified firewall rule. During update, the firewall rule with the specified name will be replaced with this new firewall rule.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: firewallRuleName
parameters.description: The name of the firewall rule to create or update.

parameters.description: Client Api Version.

requestBody.description: Parameters supplied to create or update the firewall rule.

200.description: Successfully created or updated the specified firewall rule.

delete.description: Deletes the specified firewall rule from the specified Data Lake Store account.

accountCount.description: The current number of accounts under this subscription.

maxAccountCount.description: The maximum supported number of accounts under this subscription.

migrationState.description: The Boolean value of true or false to indicate the maintenance state.

subscriptionId.description: The subscription credentials that uniquely identifies the subscription.

CapabilityInformation.description: Subscription-level properties and limits for Data Lake Store.

name.description: The Data Lake Store name to check availability for.

type.description: The resource type. Note: This should not be set by the user, as the constant value is Microsoft.DataLakeStore/accounts

CheckNameAvailabilityParameters.description: Data Lake Store account name availability check parameters.

defaultGroup.description: The default owner group for all new folders and files created in the Data Lake Store account.

encryptionState.description: The current state of encryption for this Data Lake Store account.

firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this Data Lake Store account.

newTier.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

trustedIdProviderState.description: The current state of the trusted identity provider feature for this Data Lake Store account.

trustedIdProviders.description: The list of trusted identity providers associated with this Data Lake Store account.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

name.description: The unique name of the firewall rule to create.

CreateFirewallRuleWithAccountParameters.description: The parameters used to create a new firewall rule while creating a new Data Lake Store account.

CreateOrUpdateFirewallRuleParameters.description: The parameters used to create a new firewall rule.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

CreateOrUpdateFirewallRuleProperties.description: The firewall rule properties to use when creating a new firewall rule.

CreateOrUpdateTrustedIdProviderParameter.description: The parameters used to create a new trusted identity provider.

idProvider.description: The URL of this trusted identity provider.

CreateOrUpdateTrustedIdProviderPropertie.description: The trusted identity provider properties to use when creating a new trusted identity provider.

CreateOrUpdateVirtualNetworkRuleParamete.description: The parameters used to create a new virtual network rule.

subnetId.description: The resource identifier for the subnet.

CreateOrUpdateVirtualNetworkRuleProperti.description: The virtual network rule properties to use when creating a new virtual network rule.

name.description: The unique name of the trusted identity provider to create.

CreateTrustedIdProviderWithAccountParame.description: The parameters used to create a new trusted identity provider while creating a new Data Lake Store account.

name.description: The unique name of the virtual network rule to create.

CreateVirtualNetworkRuleWithAccountParam.description: The parameters used to create a new virtual network rule while creating a new Data Lake Store account.

DataLakeStoreAccountBasic.description: Basic Data Lake Store account information, returned on list calls.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

DataLakeStoreAccountListResult.description: Data Lake Store account list information response.

currentTier.description: The commitment tier in use for the current month.

defaultGroup.description: The default owner group for all new folders and files created in the Data Lake Store account.

encryptionProvisioningState.description: The current state of encryption provisioning for this Data Lake Store account.

encryptionState.description: The current state of encryption for this Data Lake Store account.

firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this Data Lake Store account.

newTier.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

trustedIdProviderState.description: The current state of the trusted identity provider feature for this Data Lake Store account.

trustedIdProviders.description: The list of trusted identity providers associated with this Data Lake Store account.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

DataLakeStoreAccountProperties.description: Data Lake Store account properties information.

accountId.description: The unique identifier associated with this Data Lake Store account.

endpoint.description: The full CName endpoint for this account.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning status of the Data Lake Store account.

state.description: The state of the Data Lake Store account.

DataLakeStoreAccountPropertiesBasic.description: The basic account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Store account.

type.description: The type of encryption configuration being used. Currently the only supported types are 'UserManaged' and 'ServiceManaged'.

EncryptionConfig.description: The encryption configuration for the account.

principalId.description: The principal identifier associated with the encryption.

tenantId.description: The tenant identifier associated with the encryption.

type.description: The type of encryption being used. Currently the only supported type is 'SystemAssigned'.

FirewallRule.description: Data Lake Store firewall rule information.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

FirewallRuleListResult.description: Data Lake Store firewall rule list information.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

encryptionKeyName.description: The name of the user managed encryption key.

encryptionKeyVersion.description: The version of the user managed encryption key.

keyVaultResourceId.description: The resource identifier for the user managed Key Vault being used to encrypt.

KeyVaultMetaInfo.description: Metadata information used by account encryption.

message.description: The message describing why the Data Lake Store account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.

nameAvailable.description: The Boolean value of true or false to indicate whether the Data Lake Store account name is available or not.

reason.description: The reason why the Data Lake Store account name is not available, if nameAvailable is false.

NameAvailabilityInformation.description: Data Lake Store account name availability result information.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

Operation.description: An available operation for Data Lake Store.

description.description: A friendly description of the operation.

operation.description: A friendly name of the operation.

provider.description: The resource provider of the operation.

resource.description: The resource type of the operation.

OperationDisplay.description: The display information for a particular operation.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

OperationListResult.description: The list of available operations for Data Lake Store.

SubResource.description: The resource model definition for a nested resource.

TrustedIdProvider.description: Data Lake Store trusted identity provider information.

nextLink.description: The link (url) to the next page of results.

value.description: The results of the list operation.

TrustedIdProviderListResult.description: Data Lake Store trusted identity provider list information.

idProvider.description: The URL of this trusted identity provider.

UpdateDataLakeStoreAccountParameters.description: Data Lake Store account information to update.

defaultGroup.description: The default owner group for all new folders and files created in the Data Lake Store account.

firewallAllowAzureIps.description: The current state of allowing or disallowing IPs originating within Azure through the firewall. If the firewall is disabled, this is not enforced.

firewallRules.description: The list of firewall rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

firewallState.description: The current state of the IP address firewall for this Data Lake Store account. Disabling the firewall does not remove existing rules, they will just be ignored until the firewall is re-enabled.

newTier.description: The commitment tier to use for next month.

trustedIdProviderState.description: The current state of the trusted identity provider feature for this Data Lake Store account. Disabling trusted identity provider functionality does not remove the providers, they will just be ignored until this feature is re-enabled.

trustedIdProviders.description: The list of trusted identity providers associated with this Data Lake Store account.

virtualNetworkRules.description: The list of virtual network rules associated with this Data Lake Store account.

UpdateDataLakeStoreAccountProperties.description: Data Lake Store account properties information to be updated.

UpdateEncryptionConfig.description: The encryption configuration used to update a user managed Key Vault key.

UpdateFirewallRuleParameters.description: The parameters used to update a firewall rule.

endIpAddress.description: The end IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

startIpAddress.description: The start IP address for the firewall rule. This can be either ipv4 or ipv6. Start and End should be in the same protocol.

UpdateFirewallRuleProperties.description: The firewall rule properties to use when updating a firewall rule.

name.description: The unique name of the firewall rule to update.

UpdateFirewallRuleWithAccountParameters.description: The parameters used to update a firewall rule while updating a Data Lake Store account.

encryptionKeyVersion.description: The version of the user managed encryption key to update through a key rotation.

UpdateKeyVaultMetaInfo.description: The Key Vault update information used for user managed key rotation.

UpdateTrustedIdProviderParameters.description: The parameters used to update a trusted identity provider.

idProvider.description: The URL of this trusted identity provider.

UpdateTrustedIdProviderProperties.description: The trusted identity provider properties to use when updating a trusted identity provider.

name.description: The unique name of the trusted identity provider to update.

UpdateTrustedIdProviderWithAccountParame.description: The parameters used to update a trusted identity provider while updating a Data Lake Store account.

UpdateVirtualNetworkRuleParameters.description: The parameters used to update a virtual network rule.

subnetId.description: The resource identifier for the subnet.

UpdateVirtualNetworkRuleProperties.description: The virtual network rule properties to use when updating a virtual network rule.

name.description: The unique name of the virtual network rule to update.

UpdateVirtualNetworkRuleWithAccountParam.description: The parameters used to update a virtual network rule while updating a Data Lake Store account.

currentValue.description: Gets the current count of the allocated resources in the subscription.

limit.description: Gets the maximum count of the resources that can be allocated in the subscription.

value.description: Gets or sets the list of Storage Resource Usages.

UsageListResult.description: The response from the List Usages operation.

localizedValue.description: Gets a localized string describing the resource name.
